se.kth.akok.index.geometries.boundary

Class Boundary

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.akok.index.geometries.boundary.Boundary

  • public class Boundary
extends Object
    Represents the geometry of the bounding box of the scene.
    Author:
    Andreas Kokkalis

      • isPointOnBoundary

        public static boolean isPointOnBoundary(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment ls,
                        com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate coordinate)
        Checks if the shadow point is on the bounding box. lineIntersection extends infinitely the line segments, and thus the projection maybe on a different edge of the bounding box than preferred.
        Parameters:
        ls - the line segment representing the edge of the bounding box
        coordinate - the coordinates of the intersection point
        Returns:
        true if coordinate is on line segment, else false
